column4: hey pici how can we divide the virtual desktops on two monitors ,i.e. is if there are four virtual desktops , then i need 2 on each
this is actually sth defined by the freedesktop standards, and they never though about it
some tiling window managers behave this way by default though
like i said, its not impossible. but those are actually distinct displays, they are not xinerama. or the wm handles them in non-fd way
